TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Vbc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

Docs.summary: Implements the Vbc task. Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [Vbc Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3).

Docs.param: Command line builder to add arguments to.
Docs.summary: Fills the specified parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.

Docs.summary: Compiles the project through the host object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會取得在執行期間如果主應用程式物件傳遞至`Vbc`工作。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisabledWarnings { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DisabledWarnings : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets one or more warnings to suppress that are specified by the numeric part of the warning identifier.
Docs.value: 由警告識別項的數字部分所指定要隱藏的警告。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若有多個警告，則會以分號分隔。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DocumentationFile : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Turns on documentation comments processing and gets or sets the output documentation XML file.
Docs.value: 輸出文件 XML 檔案。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorReport : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.
Docs.value: 指定工作如何報告內部編譯器錯誤的字串值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此屬性可以有下列值：
- `prompt`
- `send`
- `none`
如果`prompt`指定發生編譯器內部錯誤，則會提示使用者選擇是否要將錯誤資料傳送給 Microsoft。
如果指定 `send` 且發生編譯器內部錯誤時，工作會將錯誤資料傳送給 Microsoft。
預設值為 `none`，僅報告文字輸出中的錯誤。

Public Overrides Function Execute () As Boolean

Docs.summary: Override Execute so that we can move the PDB file, if we need to, after the compiler is done.

member this.GenerateDocumentation : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to process documentation comments to an XML file.
Docs.value: 如果Vbc工作會處理文件註解的 XML 檔案，否則。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸出 XML 檔的名稱是可執行檔或工作所建立的文件庫的名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

Docs.param: A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler
The message importance: High,Low, or Normal
Docs.summary: This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦我們看到標準的 vb 警告或錯誤，我們擷取它，然後抓取接下來的 3 行，因此我們可以將轉換的字串形式的 FileName.vb(line,column) 這可讓我們在 ide 中報告的行和資料行的 FileName.vb(line) 形式並因此篩選重複的情況下，針對多目標中的錯誤訊息，或只是波浪線適當的權杖，而不是整行。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OptionCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OptionCompare : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.
Docs.value: 字串值，這個值指定如何進行字串比較。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此屬性可以有下列值：
- `binary`
- `text`
值 `binary` 指定此工作使用二進位字串比較。 值 `text` 指定此工作使用文字字串比較。 預設值是 `binary`。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether explicit declaration of variables is required.
